timeline.bodyText: How about "The {es} .tar.gz package does not", to avoid the possessive, and "systemd module", adding "module". And instead of "To automatically start {es} when the system boots up" -> "To manage Elasticsearch as a service"?
timeline.author: jasontedor
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -21,5 +21,6 @@ To shut down Elasticsearch, kill the process ID recorded in the `pid` file:
 pkill -F pid
 --------------------------------------------
 
-NOTE: The startup scripts provided in the <<rpm,RPM>> and <<deb,Debian>>
-packages take care of starting and stopping the Elasticsearch process for you.
+NOTE: {es}'s `.tar.gz` package do not include `systemd`. To automatically start

replies.bodyText: Sounds good. Thanks for the suggestions.
replies.author: jrodewig
